// === BOSS01 (Patterned shots + weak point) ===
// Objects: Boss01 (Sprite, instance vars: Phase=1, HP=20), BossCore (Sprite, instance vars: HP=10)
//          BossBullet (Sprite, Bullet)
// Notes: Place BossCore pinned to Boss01 center. Destroy Boss when Core HP <= 0.

On created (Boss01)
→ Boss01: Set Phase to 1
→ Boss01: Set HP to 20
→ Start timer "BossPhase" for 6.0 seconds (once)

Every tick
→ If Boss01.Phase = 1
   // radial burst every 0.8s
   Every 0.8 seconds
   → Repeat 12 times (i from 0 to 11)
     → Create BossBullet at Boss01
     → BossBullet: Set angle to i * 30
     → BossBullet: Set bullet speed to 300
→ Else If Boss01.Phase = 2
   // aimed shots at players, alternating
   Every 0.35 seconds
   → Pick nearest of (Player, Player2)
   → Create BossBullet at Boss01
   → BossBullet: Set angle toward (Picked.X, Picked.Y)
   → BossBullet: Set bullet speed to 520
→ Else If Boss01.Phase = 3
   // spiral pattern
   Every 0.12 seconds
   → Add 15 to Boss01.Angle
   → Create BossBullet at Boss01
   → BossBullet: Set angle to Boss01.Angle
   → BossBullet: Set bullet speed to 420

On timer "BossPhase"
→ Boss01: Add 1 to Phase
→ If Boss01.Phase > 3 → Boss01: Set Phase to 1
→ Start timer "BossPhase" for 6.0 seconds (once)

// Weak point logic
On collision Bullet_basic with BossCore → BossCore: Subtract 1 from HP → Destroy Bullet_basic
On collision Bullet_spread with BossCore → BossCore: Subtract 1 from HP → Destroy Bullet_spread
On collision Bullet_laser with BossCore → BossCore: Subtract 2 from HP → Destroy Bullet_laser

BossCore: Compare HP <= 0
→ Destroy BossCore
→ Boss01: Subtract 999 from HP  // force kill
→ Create Explosion at Boss01
→ Destroy Boss01

// Boss/body contact damage
On collision Player with Boss01 → Player: Subtract 1 from HP
On collision Player2 with Boss01 → Player2: Subtract 1 from HP

// Boss bullets damage players
On collision BossBullet with Player → Player: Subtract 1 from HP → Destroy BossBullet
On collision BossBullet with Player2 → Player2: Subtract 1 from HP → Destroy BossBullet
